dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...just a short-sighted, like, protectionist move, really, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...just a short-sighted, like, protectionist move, really, if you ask me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Protectionist? No, it's about, um, supporting our own, isn't it? The Ministry said so.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Protectionist? No, it's about, um, supporting our own, isn't it? The Ministry said so.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The decision was made in order to support domestic producers and stabilize the internal market, citing the press service of the ministry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Supporting our own at the expense of, what, choice? And probably, like, higher prices for consumers down the line, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Supporting our own at the expense of, what, choice? And probably, like, higher prices for consumers down the line, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Higher prices? The article clearly states it's to improve the price situation and reduce dependency. That's good for everyone, eventually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Higher prices? The article clearly states it's to improve the price situation and reduce dependency. That's good for everyone, eventually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry believes that this measure will improve the price situation on the market and reduce dependency on external supplies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eventually? Six months, dude. That's, uh, a lot of time for prices to just artificially inflate because there's no competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eventually? Six months, dude. That's, uh, a lot of time for prices to just artificially inflate because there's no competition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ban will remain in effect for six months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Artificial? It's regulating import volumes! And stimulating domestic production. That's, um, market correction, not artificial inflation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Artificial? It's regulating import volumes! And stimulating domestic production. That's, um, market correction, not artificial inflation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry explained that the ban is aimed at regulating import volumes and stimulating domestic production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Market correction? It's a ban! A ban on fresh chicken eggs! What about consumers who prefer, you know, specific imported varieties?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Market correction? It's a ban! A ban on fresh chicken eggs! What about consumers who prefer, you know, specific imported varieties?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the order of the Acting Minister of Agriculture, the restriction will come into force from the moment of state registration and will apply to the import of "fresh chicken eggs."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's about the bigger picture, A. Stabilizing the internal market. Making sure our farmers, uh, stay in business. That's food security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about the bigger picture, A. Stabilizing the internal market. Making sure our farmers, uh, stay in business. That's food security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The decision was made in order to support domestic producers and stabilize the internal market, citing the press service of the ministry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Food security doesn't come from limiting supply, B. It comes from, like, a robust, competitive market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Food security doesn't come from limiting supply, B. It comes from, like, a robust, competitive market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But if the domestic market is being, um, undermined by cheap imports, then how robust can it be?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if the domestic market is being, um, undermined by cheap imports, then how robust can it be?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Undermined? Or just... competitive? Look, they've been considering this for ages, even signed a memorandum. It feels like a coordinated, uh, attempt to just lock out competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Undermined? Or just... competitive? Look, they've been considering this for ages, even signed a memorandum. It feels like a coordinated, uh, attempt to just lock out competition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Ministry of Agriculture considered introducing restrictions on the import of table eggs. Together with the Ministry of Trade and Integration, the Union of Poultry Farmers, the Association of Egg Producers, and the Union of Retail Chains [Sojuz Torgovyh Setej Respubliki Kazahstan], the Agriculture Ministry signed a memorandum of cooperation to implement measures aimed at stabilizing prices for socially significant food products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a memorandum for stabilizing prices for socially significant food products. That's a good thing! It's not, um, a conspiracy to 'lock out competition'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a memorandum for stabilizing prices for socially significant food products. That's a good thing! It's not, um, a conspiracy to 'lock out competition'.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the Agriculture Ministry signed a memorandum of cooperation to implement measures aimed at stabilizing prices for socially significant food products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, six months of no imported eggs is going to magically make our domestic producers, like, suddenly efficient and competitive? I just don't buy it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, six months of no imported eggs is going to magically make our domestic producers, like, suddenly efficient and competitive? I just don't buy it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It gives them a chance! A chance to, uh, grow without being immediately undercut. It's a temporary measure, A, a temporary ban.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gives them a chance! A chance to, uh, grow without being immediately undercut. It's a temporary measure, A, a temporary ban.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Agriculture has imposed a temporary ban on the import of chicken eggs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Temporary until they decide it's, uh, too good to give up, probably. I mean, what about exceptional cases? They still need ministry approval for those.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temporary until they decide it's, uh, too good to give up, probably. I mean, what about exceptional cases? They still need ministry approval for those.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The document states that, in exceptional cases, the import of eggs may be allowed with the approval of the Ministry of Agriculture, subject to a relevant conclusion from the authorized body in the field of veterinary control and supervision.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because you need veterinary control! You can't just, uh, let anything in willy-nilly. It's about safety and control too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because you need veterinary control! You can't just, uh, let anything in willy-nilly. It's about safety and control too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The document states that, in exceptional cases, the import of eggs may be allowed with the approval of the Ministry of Agriculture, subject to a relevant conclusion from the authorized body in the field of veterinary control and supervision.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Safety and control, or just another layer of bureaucracy to ensure their protectionism works? I'm telling you, this is a terrible idea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Safety and control, or just another layer of bureaucracy to ensure their protectionism works? I'm telling you, this is a terrible idea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're just looking for problems where there are solutions. This is a clear move to strengthen our agriculture. It's a smart play.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just looking for problems where there are solutions. This is a clear move to strengthen our agriculture. It's a smart play.
